name: Training Shooting Target
description:
Training Shooting Target is a First person action game, allows user to experience one of the most thrilling experience of combat missions. Here is a simple game for range shooting practice for all ages shooter. It’s a best range shooting practice game. Get ready shooters to enjoy Training Shooting Target

Features:
- Different and exciting levels
- Very real weapon control
- Landscape and realistic 3D environment
- Realistic sounds
- Wide variety of static and mobile objects to shoot
- Excellent shooting experience
- The best game for lovers of guns and shots
